pullRequest.title: [1.16] Reimplement ICloudRenderHandler, ISkyRenderHandler and IWeatherRenderHandler
pullRequest.bodyText:
These seem to have been dropped during the 1.16 update cycle as they got lost in dimension changes, and without them there is no way to change cloud / sky / weather rendering of existing dimensions.

I've re-added the calls to each interface in the same locations as they were in 1.15 (as that has been unchanged).
The render handlers themselves have been moved from Dimension to DimensionRenderInfo as that serves the same purpose that Dimension was before in this case.
IRenderHandler has been removed, and instead split into three specific interfaces for each render hook, as was described in #6537, since the different renderers need different arguments.

commit.message: Reimplement ICloudRenderHandler, ISkyRenderHandler and IWeatherRenderHandler. Remove the deprecated IRenderHandler from 1.15 and replace patches that makes all the above useful.
Remove a space to fix patch formatting

nodes.bodyText: Now that we have seperate interfaces for everything, we might as well add more specific context, so pass in the LightTexture and the position here
You can also pass the pos in here as an additional parameter

commit.message: Added additional context to specific renderer calls: Lightmap to weather, and positions to both cloud and weather.
